DOC.brief_summary: Evaluate Clinical Performance Vanguard Knee E1 Bearing Korean Patient Population
DOC.brief_title: Prospective Multi-Center Study Vanguard With E1 Bearing
DOC.detailed_description: E1™ Vitamin E dope highly cross-linked polyethylene propose method insure long-term oxidative stability highly cross-linked ultra-high molecular weight polyethylene use total joint arthroplasty . In vitro research development study show material improve wear performance , retention mechanical property , high resistance oxidation due anti-oxidative property Vitamin E. Biomet Inc , receive FDA clearance market tibial polyethylene component make E1™ use Vanguard total knee replacement system . Vanguard Total Knee System™ The Vanguard™ Knee System design incorporate feature prior design , include : ACG , Maxim , & Ascent . The Vanguard Knee include streamlined design , round sagittal profile , deep trochlear groove . The femoral component available Cruciate Retaining ( CR ) , Posterior Stabilizing ( PS ) , Super Stabilized ( SSK ) . Tibial Bearings available various level constraint require surgeon ( CR , PS , AS , etc. ) . For study , ONLY Vanguard PS Bearing use . The purpose study evaluate clinical performance Vanguard Knee E1 Bearing TKA Korean patient population . The clinical performance evaluate base patient outcome , radiographic assessment survivorship .
DOC.criteria: Patients include study receive Vanguard knee E1 Bearing per approve indication use Vanguard Knee . Specifically Painful disable knee joint result osteoarthritis traumatic arthritis one compartment involve Correction varus , valgus , posttraumatic deformity Correction revision unsuccessful osteotomy Exclusion Criteria study comply state contraindication package insert Vanguard™ Knee E1™ Tibial Bearing . These indication state : Absolute contraindication include : infection , sepsis , osteomyelitis , failure previous joint replacement Relative contraindication include : Uncooperative patient patient neurologic disorder incapable follow direction , Osteoporosis Metabolic disorder may impair bone formation Osteomalacia Distant focus infection may spread implant site Rapid joint destruction , mark bone loss bone resorption apparent roentgenogram Vascular insufficiency , muscular atrophy , neuromuscular disease Incomplete deficient soft tissue surround knee
